info.name: DarkerDeezer
info.description: A darker user interface to Deezer, for those of us who get tired of bright webpages.
info.additionalInfo: I based this style on ReenReenReen's one. It has only been tested on Safari and Chrome so far. If you notice some weird behavior on another browser, get in touch. version 1.4 Added a nice color to text selections on the page. version 1.3 Fix to the handling of URL prefixes to include both http and https protocols. Fix to the search bar text, which became unreadable after an update in deezer's page code. version 1.2 Improvements to modal dialogs, the "live bar" (friends, notifications etc.) and the lyrics panel. version 1.1 Improvements to the comment form and to the display of comments. version 1.0 Initial release.
